issues.description: Problem statement specifies that SealSaloon.orders should be a modifiable List<Meal>, but the solution implements orders as a Meal[] array. This List vs. array mismatch could confuse students about which data structure to use when creating and manipulating the orders collection.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the solution (and guidance) to use List<Meal> for orders (e.g., private List<Meal> orders = new ArrayList<>();) or revise the problem statement to consistently refer to an array of Meal for orders.
